<title level="1" pfs="">[Mammoth Turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1458)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Mammoth Turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1458)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 31</row>

**Perception** +24; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +0

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +5

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** The mammoth turtle can hold its breath for 4 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 270

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +29,
**Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Capsize** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The turtle tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The turtle must succeed at a DC 43 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the turtle) or the pilot's [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) DC, whichever is higher.

**Fling** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The turtle has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) in its jaws; **Effect** The turtle flings the creature into the air from its mouth, sending it up to 10 feet up and 20 feet away. The creature falls 25 feet (assuming the turtle flings it as high as it can) and takes the appropriate amount of bludgeoning damage from the fall.

**Shell Defense** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant snapping turtle retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 38, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Large, 3d12+10 bludgeoning, Rupture 38

</column>
name: Mammoth Turtle

The turtle must succeed at a DC 43 Athletics check (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the turtle) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher. Fling Single Action Requirements The turtle has a creature grabbed in its jaws; Effect The turtle flings the creature into the air from its mouth, sending it up to 10 feet up and 20 feet away. The creature falls 25 feet (assuming the turtle flings it as high as it can) and takes the appropriate amount of bludgeoning damage from the fall. Shell Defense Single Action The giant snapping turtle retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 38, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action. Swallow Whole Single Action Large, 3d12+10 bludgeoning, Rupture 38
